summary: The United Nations assembles the ultimate weapon to defeat Godzilla, while scientists discover a fresh pteranodon egg on a remote Japanese island.
cast: Masahiro Takashima|Ryoko Sano|Megumi Odaka|Yûsuke Kawazu|Akira Nakao|Kôichi Ueda|Kenji Sahara|Daijirô Harada|Shelley Sweeney|Shinobu Nakayama|Tadao Takashima|Keiko Imamura|Sayaka Osawa|Leo Meneghetti|Andrew Smith|Kenpachirô Satsuma|Wataru Fukuda|'Hurricane Ryu' Hariken|Simon Broad|Kôichi Kawakita|Rik Thomas
keywords: extrasensory perception|psychotronic film|godzilla character|mechagodzilla character|rodan character
title: Gojira vs. Mekagojira
